header.subtitle: Data Science & Cyber Security Beginner
header.description: Bridging the gap between data insights and secure systems. Specializing in transforming complex data into actionable intelligence while ensuring robust digital security.

about.subtitle: Professional Background
about.description: With over 8 years of experience in the tech industry, I've developed a unique blend of expertise in data science and cybersecurity. My journey began with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, followed by a Master's in Cybersecurity. I've worked with Fortune 500 companies, government agencies, and startups to solve complex problems at the intersection of data and security.
